snippet: Shares of Office Depot and Staples plunged after the companies called off their proposed merger.
abstract: Stocks fall as retail and health care shares drop sharply.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Office Depot and Staples plunged after the companies called off their proposed merger.

headline.main: Losses in Retailing and Health Drag Down Indexes
